amendment.description: To add availability of family support services to the matters required to be included in the report on the conduct of Operation Iraqi Freedom in section 1023.

vote.text: Amendment SA 763 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 763 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S6808-6810; text: CR H6809) To add availability of family support services to the matters required to be included in the report on the conduct of Operation Iraqi Freedom in section 1023.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 763 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 763 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
